coreAtributes.name: Power Scouter
coreAtributes.description: A power scouter, the display is broken na dhas a faint image of 9000 burned into the screen.

displacementText.playerSelf: You take off your power scouter.
displacementText.playerNPCRough: You grab hold of [npc.name]'s power scouter and roughly pulls it off [npc.her].
displacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of your power scouter and roughly pulls it off.
displacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc.Name] grabs hold of [npc2.name]'s power scouter and roughly pulls it off [npc2.her].

replacementText.playerSelf: You slip on your power scouter.
replacementText.playerNPC: You slip the power scouter onto [npc.her] face.
replacementText.playerNPCRough: You hold [npc.name] still as you roughly push the power scouter onto [npc.her] face.
replacementText.NPCPlayer: [npc.Name] slips the power scouter onto your face.
replacementText.NPCPlayerRough: [npc.Name] holds you still as [npc.she] roughly pushes the power scouter onto your face.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPC: [npc1.Name] slips the power scouter onto [npc2.name]'s face.
replacementText.NPCOtherNPCRough: [npc1.Name] holds [npc2.name] still as [npc1.she] roughly pushes the power scouter onto [npc2.her] face.
